content.text:
{"author":{"id":"MDQ6VXNlcjE0MzI0ODk=","is_bot":false,"login":"kennyklee","name":"Kenny Lee"},"body":"## Summary
- Fix gateway launchd job continuing to retry every 10 seconds when in remote mode
- Remove early return in `stop()` that skipped disabling the launchd job

## Problem
When switching from local to remote mode, the `stop()` function in `GatewayProcessManager` had an early return when `connectionModeIsRemote()` was true. This skipped the code that disables the launchd job.

Since the launchd plist has `KeepAlive=true`, macOS keeps restarting the gateway daemon every 10 seconds (the default throttle interval). The daemon starts, sees `gateway.mode=remote`, logs "Gateway start blocked", and exitsâ€”then launchd restarts it again.

## Solution
Remove the early return so the launchd job gets disabled regardless of the current connection mode. When switching back to local mode, the existing `setActive(true)` and `ensureLaunchAgentEnabledIfNeeded()` calls re-enable it.

## Test plan
- [x] Swift build passes
- [x] TypeScript lint/build passes
- [ ] Manual test: switch to remote mode, verify gateway log stops showing repeated "Gateway start blocked" messages

Fixes #2433

- Fix gateway launchd job continuing to retry every 10 seconds when in remote mode
- Remove early return in `stop()` that skipped disabling the launchd job

## Problem
When switching from local to remote mode, the `stop()` function in `GatewayProcessManager` had an early return when `connectionModeIsRemote()` was true. This skipped the code that disables the launchd job.

Since the launchd plist has `KeepAlive=true`, macOS keeps restarting the gateway daemon every 10 seconds (the default throttle interval). The daemon starts, sees `gateway.mode=remote`, logs "Gateway start blocked", and exitsâ€”then launchd restarts it again.

## Solution
Remove the early return so the launchd job gets disabled regardless of the current connection mode. When switching back to local mode, the existing `setActive(true)` and `ensureLaunchAgentEnabledIfNeeded()` calls re-enable it.

## Test plan

- [x] TypeScript lint/build passes

content.thinking: Got it. This PR is about fixing an issue with the gateway on macOS when switching to remote mode. Let me summarize for the user.

content.text:
PR #2437 â€” **"fix(macos): disable gateway launchd job when switching to remote mode"**

**What it does:** Fixes a bug where the Gateway daemon on macOS keeps restarting every 10 seconds when you switch to remote mode.

**The problem:** When `gateway.mode=remote`, the `stop()` function had an early return that skipped disabling the launchd job. Since `KeepAlive=true` in the plist, macOS kept restarting the gateway every 10 secondsâ€”it would start, see it's in remote mode, log "Gateway start blocked", exit, then relaunch.

**The fix:** Remove that early return so the launchd job gets disabled regardless of mode. Switching back to local mode re-enables it.

**Status:** Closed on Jan 28, 2026. It was merged.
